summary: I HAVE A 1999 MERCURY VILLAGER PURCHASED FROM BLUE HILL LINCOLN MERCURY IN CANTON, MASSACHUSETTS. I HAVE A PROBLEM WITH THE SEAT BELT MECHANISM ON THE 2ND ROW OF SEATS ON THE FAR LEFT SIDE. THIS PROBLEM OCCURRED ONCE BEFORE AND AFTER MUCH ARGUMENT THE DEALERSHIP RELUCTANTLY REPLACED THE MECHANISM. NOW I AM HAVING THE SAME EXACT PROBLEM AND SINCE I CANNOT DEMONSTRATE THE PROBLEM ON COMMAND, THE DEALERSHIP REFUSES TO REPLACE THE FAULTY MECHANISM.  *JB
